physical_appearance: "The image shows a painting. It is rectangular in shape. It depicts a seated figure on a stool. The seated figure is wearing a shirt and shorts, as well as headgear. There is a table beside the seated figue, and there are objects placed on top of it. The title, signature, and year, ""Elizabeth Walk
creator_1: Tan, Choon Ghee, 1930- Tan, Choon Ghee

subject_terms_2: above the signature and year.  " Drawings Singapore
